summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account over a two-week period in October 2013. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, indicating a significant transfer of funds.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $200,000.00 was made into the account.

locations: Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $0.00 on October 18, 2013.
A significant deposit of $200,000.00 was made on October 21, 2013.
The ending balance as of October 31, 2013, was $200,000.00.
No service charges or fees were incurred during the statement period.
The document includes contact information for customer service inquiries.
